entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of drizzle this evening then to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
